original_title: SJB Looks At Nayana Wasalathilake To Replace Chaminda Wijesiri
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Following the resignation of MP Chaminda Wijesiri earlier today, the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is considering Nayana Wasalathilake as his replacement.
SJB General Secretary MP Ranjith Madduma Bandara said that Nayana Wasalathilake will be selected according to the established party preferential votes list.
Wijesiri, tendered his resignation during the first Parliamentary session of 2024.
